title: Losar (Tibetan New Year) Celebrations
description: Prayers, cham dances, and community feasts.

title: Vajravarahi Drupchod Ritual
description: A propitiation ritual to Vajrayogini held annually at Rumtek for seven days.

title: Losar Chaam Dance
description: Masked Cham dances performed during Tibetan New Year celebrations.

title: Annual Cham Festival
description: Annual Cham dance held on the 28th–29th day of the 12th Tibetan month.

title: Detor Cham Dance
description: Colorful Cham dances held on the 18th–19th of the 12th Tibetan month.

title: Pang Lhabsol Festival
description: Pang Lhabsol, a warrior dance festival honoring Mt. Khangchendzonga, held annually.

title: Chaam Dance Performance
description: Chaam performances held on the 28th–29th of the 10th Tibetan month.

title: Guru Rinpoche Tshechu
description: Monastic rituals and masked dances honoring Padmasambhava.
